column1: In the earliest versions of the legendarium
column2: Gothmog (balrog) is described as the son of Morgoth and the ogres Fluithuin or Ulbandi.
column3: Entries in the Name-list to The Fall of Gondolin
column4: Gothmog Both ogresses and the idea that the Valar had children were discarded by Tolkien fairly early on.

column1: Category:Characters in The Book of Lost Tales
